client.filters.credits 源代码

'''
@File:credits.py
@DateTime:2022/2/28 3:33 下午
@Author:xixiaoyu
@Desc:
'''
from datetime import datetime

from django_filters import rest_framework as filters

from client.models.credit import Credit

from client.models.credit_certificate import CreditCertificate, ReviewLog
from consts.common import FINANCE_APPLY_CODE, TRANSFER_APPLICATION_CODE, OPEN_RECEIVE_CONFIRM_CODE, \
    RECEIVE_CONFIRM_CODE, OPEN_APPLICATION_CODE



[文档]class CreditsFilter(filters.FilterSet):
    """授信管理列表页过滤器"""
    credit_number = filters.CharFilter(lookup_expr="icontains", field_name="credit_number")
    agreement_no = filters.CharFilter(lookup_expr="icontains", field_name="agreement_no")
    receive_company = filters.CharFilter(lookup_expr="contains", field_name="receive_company__name")
    capital_company = filters.CharFilter(lookup_expr="contains", field_name="capital_company__name")


[文档]    class Meta:
        model = Credit
        fields = ["credit_number", "agreement_no", "receive_company", "capital_company"]




[文档]class CreditOpenFilter(filters.FilterSet):
    """
    x信管理-x信开立列表页过滤器
    """
    credit_number = filters.CharFilter(field_name='number', lookup_expr='icontains')
    review_status = filters.CharFilter(method='filter_status')
    company = filters.CharFilter(field_name='company__name', lookup_expr='contains')
    created_start = filters.CharFilter(method='filter_created_start')
    created_end = filters.CharFilter(method='filter_created_end')
    promise_pay_start = filters.CharFilter(field_name='promise_pay_at', lookup_expr='gte')
    promise_pay_end = filters.CharFilter(field_name='promise_pay_at', lookup_expr='lte')


[文档]    def filter_status(self, queryset, name, value):
        if value != 'pass':
            return queryset.exclude(review_status='pass')
        return queryset.filter(review_status=value)



[文档]    def filter_created_start(self, queryset, name, value):
        certificate_id = list(queryset.values_list('id', flat=True))
        value = datetime.strptime(value, '%Y-%m-%d')
        ids = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
            data_id__in=certificate_id,
            data_table="credit_certificate",
            work_flow__code=OPEN_APPLICATION_CODE,
            created_at__date__gte=value,
            result='pass',
        ).values_list("data_id", flat=True)

        return queryset.filter(id__in=list(ids))



[文档]    def filter_created_end(self, queryset, name, value):
        certificate_id = list(queryset.values_list('id', flat=True))
        value = datetime.strptime(value, '%Y-%m-%d')
        ids = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
            data_id__in=certificate_id,
            data_table="credit_certificate",
            work_flow__code=OPEN_APPLICATION_CODE,
            created_at__date__lte=value,
            result='pass',
        ).values_list("data_id", flat=True)

        return queryset.filter(id__in=list(ids))



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = [
            "credit_number", "company", "review_status",
            "created_start", "created_end", "promise_pay_start",
            "promise_pay_end"
        ]




[文档]class CreditReceivesFilter(filters.FilterSet):
    """
    x信管理-x信待接收-可用列表页过滤器
    """
    credit_number = filters.CharFilter(field_name='number', lookup_expr='icontains')
    company = filters.CharFilter(field_name='credit__receive_company__name', lookup_expr='contains')
    transfer_company = filters.CharFilter(field_name='from_company__name', lookup_expr='contains')
    receive_start = filters.CharFilter(method='filter_receive_start')
    receive_end = filters.CharFilter(method='filter_receive_end')
    promise_pay_start = filters.CharFilter(field_name='promise_pay_at', lookup_expr='gte')
    promise_pay_end = filters.CharFilter(field_name='promise_pay_at', lookup_expr='lte')


[文档]    def filter_receive_start(self, queryset, name, value):
        business = queryset.values_list('business__name', flat=True)
        certificate_id = list(queryset.values_list('id', flat=True))
        value = datetime.strptime(value, '%Y-%m-%d')
        id_lst = []
        for i in list(business):
            if i == 'open':
                ids = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
                    data_id__in=certificate_id,
                    data_table="credit_certificate",
                    work_flow__code=OPEN_RECEIVE_CONFIRM_CODE,
                    created_at__date__gte=value,
                    result='pass',
                ).values_list("data_id", flat=True)
                id_lst.extend(list(ids))
                continue

            ids = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
                data_id__in=certificate_id,
                data_table="credit_certificate",
                work_flow__code=RECEIVE_CONFIRM_CODE,
                created_at__date__gte=value,
                result='pass',
            ).values_list("data_id", flat=True)
            id_lst.extend(list(ids))
        id_lst = list(set(id_lst))
        return queryset.filter(id__in=id_lst)



[文档]    def filter_receive_end(self, queryset, name, value):
        business = queryset.values_list('business__name', flat=True)
        certificate_id = list(queryset.values_list('id', flat=True))
        value = datetime.strptime(value, '%Y-%m-%d')
        id_lst = []
        for i in list(business):
            if i == 'open':
                ids = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
                    data_id__in=certificate_id,
                    data_table="credit_certificate",
                    work_flow__code=OPEN_RECEIVE_CONFIRM_CODE,
                    created_at__date__lte=value,
                    result='pass',
                ).values_list("data_id", flat=True)
                id_lst.extend(list(ids))
                continue

            ids = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
                data_id__in=certificate_id,
                data_table="credit_certificate",
                work_flow__code=RECEIVE_CONFIRM_CODE,
                created_at__date__lte=value,
                result='pass',
            ).values_list("data_id", flat=True)
            id_lst.extend(list(ids))
        id_lst = list(set(id_lst))
        return queryset.filter(id__in=id_lst)



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = [
            "credit_number", "company", "receive_start",
            "receive_end", "promise_pay_start",
            "promise_pay_end", "transfer_company"
        ]




[文档]class TransfersFilter(filters.FilterSet):
    """
    x信管理-x信转让列表页过滤器
    """
    credit_number = filters.CharFilter(field_name='number', lookup_expr='icontains')
    status = filters.CharFilter(method='filter_status')
    receive_company = filters.CharFilter(field_name='company__name', lookup_expr='contains')
    transfer_start = filters.CharFilter(method='filter_transfer_start')
    transfer_end = filters.CharFilter(method='filter_transfer_end')
    promise_pay_start = filters.CharFilter(field_name='promise_pay_at', lookup_expr='gte')
    promise_pay_end = filters.CharFilter(field_name='promise_pay_at', lookup_expr='lte')


[文档]    def filter_status(self, queryset, name, value):
        if value != 'pass':
            return queryset.exclude(review_status='pass')
        return queryset.filter(review_status=value)



[文档]    def filter_transfer_start(self, queryset, name, value):
        certificate_id = list(queryset.values_list('id', flat=True))
        value = datetime.strptime(value, '%Y-%m-%d')
        ids = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
            data_id__in=certificate_id,
            data_table="credit_certificate",
            work_flow__code=TRANSFER_APPLICATION_CODE,
            created_at__date__gte=value,
            result='pass',
        ).values_list("data_id", flat=True)
        return queryset.filter(id__in=list(ids))



[文档]    def filter_transfer_end(self, queryset, name, value):
        certificate_id = list(queryset.values_list('id', flat=True))
        value = datetime.strptime(value, '%Y-%m-%d')
        ids = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
            data_id__in=certificate_id,
            data_table="credit_certificate",
            work_flow__code=TRANSFER_APPLICATION_CODE,
            created_at__date__lte=value,
            result='pass',
        ).values_list("data_id", flat=True)

        return queryset.filter(id__in=list(ids))



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = [
            "credit_number", "receive_company", "status",
            "transfer_start", "transfer_end", "promise_pay_start",
            "promise_pay_end"
        ]




[文档]class FinancingsFilter(filters.FilterSet):
    """
    x信管理-x信融资列表页过滤器
    """
    credit_number = filters.CharFilter(field_name='number', lookup_expr='icontains')
    status = filters.CharFilter(method='filter_status')
    capital_company = filters.CharFilter(field_name='credit__capital_company__name', lookup_expr='contains')
    financing_start = filters.CharFilter(method='filter_financing_start')
    financing_end = filters.CharFilter(method='filter_financing_end')


[文档]    def filter_status(self, queryset, name, value):
        if value != 'pass':
            return queryset.exclude(review_status='pass')
        return queryset.filter(review_status=value)



[文档]    def filter_financing_start(self, queryset, name, value):
        certificate_id = list(queryset.values_list('id', flat=True))
        value = datetime.strptime(value, '%Y-%m-%d')
        ids = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
            data_id__in=certificate_id,
            data_table="credit_certificate",
            work_flow__code=FINANCE_APPLY_CODE,
            created_at__date__gte=value,
            result='pass',
        ).values_list("data_id", flat=True)

        return queryset.filter(id__in=list(ids))



[文档]    def filter_financing_end(self, queryset, name, value):
        certificate_id = list(queryset.values_list('id', flat=True))
        value = datetime.strptime(value, '%Y-%m-%d')
        ids = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
            data_id__in=certificate_id,
            data_table="credit_certificate",
            work_flow__code=FINANCE_APPLY_CODE,
            created_at__date__lte=value,
            result='pass',
        ).values_list("data_id", flat=True)

        return queryset.filter(id__in=list(ids))



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = [
            "credit_number", "capital_company", "status",
            "financing_start", "financing_end"
        ]




[文档]class RetuensFilter(filters.FilterSet):
    """
    x信管理-x信已退回列表页过滤器
    """
    credit_number = filters.CharFilter(field_name='number', lookup_expr='icontains')
    status = filters.CharFilter(field_name='is_valid', lookup_expr='icontains')
    business = filters.CharFilter(method='filter_business')


[文档]    def filter_business(self, queryset, name, value):
        return queryset.filter(business__id=value)



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = ["credit_number", "business", "status"]




[文档]class ExpiresFilter(filters.FilterSet):
    """
    x信管理-x信到期列表页过滤器
    """
    credit_number = filters.CharFilter(field_name='number', lookup_expr='icontains')
    promise_pay_start = filters.CharFilter(field_name='promise_pay_at', lookup_expr='gte')
    promise_pay_end = filters.CharFilter(field_name='promise_pay_at', lookup_expr='lte')
    company = filters.CharFilter(
        field_name='credit__receive_company__name',
        lookup_expr='contains'
    )
    transfer_company = filters.CharFilter(
        field_name='from_company__name',
        lookup_expr='contains'
    )
    status = filters.CharFilter(method='filter_status')


[文档]    def filter_status(self, queryset, name, value):
        return queryset.filter(creditclear__is_clear=value)



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = [
            "credit_number", "company", "transfer_company",
            "status", "promise_pay_start", "promise_pay_end"
        ]
